original_definition: 'multi-drum household washer-dryer' means a household washer-dryer equipped with more than one drum, whether in separate units or in the same casing;
generated_definition: 'multi-drum household washer-dryer' means a household appliance that combines a washing machine and a tumble dryer into a single unit, typically with multiple drums for laundry processing.
